parameters.name: Application
parameters.description: An array that consists of the information about the software.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length. For more information, see [How do I ensure the idempotence of a request?](~~25693~~)

parameters.name: ClientVersion
parameters.description: The version of the client. By default, the latest version is used.

parameters.name: ComputeSpotPriceLimit
parameters.description: The maximum hourly price for the ECS instance under the compute node. A maximum of three decimal places can be used in the value of the parameter. The parameter is valid only when the ComputeSpotStrategy parameter is set to SpotWithPriceLimit.

parameters.name: ComputeSpotStrategy
parameters.description:
The preemption policy of the compute nodes. Valid values:

*   NoSpot: The compute nodes are pay-as-you-go instances.
*   SpotWithPriceLimit: The instance is created as a preemptible instance with a user-defined maximum hourly price.
*   SpotAsPriceGo: The instance is created as a preemptible instance for which the market price at the time of purchase is automatically used as the bidding price.

Default value: NoSpot.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description:
The description of the E-HPC cluster. The description must be 2 to 256 characters in length and cannot start with `http://` or` https://`.

This parameter is empty by default.

parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description:
The type of the domain account service. Valid values:

*   nis
*   ldap

Default value: nis.

parameters.name: EcsOrder.Compute.InstanceType
parameters.description: The instance type of the compute nodes.

parameters.name: EcsOrder.Manager.InstanceType
parameters.description: The instance type of the management node. Only Proxy Mode is supported.

parameters.name: EhpcVersion
parameters.description: The version of E-HPC. By default, the latest version is used.

parameters.name: HybridClusterOpMode
parameters.description:
The mode in which the proxy node manages the offline nodes. Valid values:

*   SSH: indicates management via SSH logon.
*   CA: indicates management through Cloud Assistant.

parameters.name: ImageId
parameters.description: The IDs of the images.

parameters.name: ImageOwnerAlias
parameters.description:
The type of the image. Valid values:

*   system: public image
*   self: custom image
*   others: shared image
*   marketplace: Alibaba Cloud Marketplace image

parameters.name: JobQueue
parameters.description: The default queue of the scale-out nodes.

parameters.name: KeyPairName
parameters.description:
The name of the key pair. The name must be 2 to 128 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, colons (:), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-). It must start with a letter and cannot start with http:// or https://.[](http://https://。、（:）、（\_）（-）。)

> To use an SSH key pair, see [Create an SSH key pair](~~51793~~).

parameters.name: Location
parameters.description: The location where the cluster resides. Set the value to OnPremise.

parameters.name: MultiOs
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the cluster supports multiple operating systems. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

Default value: false.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the cluster. The name must be 2 to 64 characters in length, and can contain only letters, digits, hyphens (-), and underscores (\_). It must start with a letter.

parameters.name: Nodes
parameters.description: The information about the nodes in the local cluster.

parameters.name: OnPremiseVolumeLocalPath
parameters.description: The path in which the on-premises file system is mounted on the nodes on the cloud.

parameters.name: OnPremiseVolumeMountPoint
parameters.description: The mount target of the on-premises file system.

parameters.name: OnPremiseVolumeProtocol
parameters.description: The type of the protocol that is used by the on-premises file system. Only NFS is supported.

parameters.name: OnPremiseVolumeRemotePath
parameters.description: The mount path of the on-premises file system.

parameters.name: OpenldapPar
parameters.description: The parameter that is used to connect to the OpenLDAP server.

parameters.name: OsTag
parameters.description: The image tag of the operating system. You can call the [ListImages](~~87213~~) operation to query the image tag.

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description:
The root password of the logon node. The password must be 8 to 30 characters in length and contain at least three of the following items: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, digits, and special characters. The following special characters are supported: `() ~ ! @ # $ % ^ & * - = + | { } [ ] : ; ‘ < > , . ? /`

> We recommend that you use HTTPS to call the API operation to prevent password leakage.

parameters.name: Plugin
parameters.description:
The mode configurations of the plug-in. This parameter takes effect only when the SchedulerType parameter is set to custom.

The value must be a JSON string. The parameter contains the following parameters: pluginMod, pluginLocalPath, and pluginOssPath.

*   pluginMod: the mode of the plug-in. The following modes are supported:

    *   oss: The plug-in is downloaded and decompressed from OSS to a local path. The local path is specified by the pluginLocalPath parameter.
    *   image: By default, the plug-in is stored in a pre-defined local path. The local path is specified by the pluginLocalPath parameter.

*   pluginLocalPath: the local path where the plug-in is stored. We recommend that you select a shared directory in oss mode and a non-shared directory in image mode.

*   pluginOssPath: the remote path where the plug-in is stored in OSS. This parameter takes effect only when the pluginMod parameter is set to oss.

parameters.name: PostInstallScript
parameters.description: The list of post-installation script information.

parameters.name: RemoteDirectory
parameters.description: The remote directory to which the file system is mounted.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: SchedulerPreInstall
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the scheduler is preinstalled for the image. Valid values:

*   true: The scheduler is preinstalled. When you create or add a node, you do not need to install the scheduler.
*   false: The scheduler is not preinstalled. When you create or add a cluster, you must install the scheduler.

parameters.name: SecurityGroupId
parameters.description:
You can select an existing security group by its ID.

> If you specify this parameter, you cannot specify the `SecurityGroupName`  parameter.

parameters.name: SecurityGroupName
parameters.description:
If you do not use an existing security group, set the parameter to the name of a new security group. A default policy is applied to the new security group.

> If you specify this parameter, you cannot specify the `SecurityGroupId` parameter.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description: The ID of the vSwitch to which the instance connects to.

parameters.name: VolumeId
parameters.description: The ID of the file system. NAS file systems cannot be automatically created.

parameters.name: VolumeMountpoint
parameters.description: The mount target of the NAS file system. The mount target is of the VPC type. Mount targets cannot be automatically created for NAS file systems.

parameters.name: VolumeProtocol
parameters.description: The type of the protocol that is used by the NAS file system. Only NFS is supported.

parameters.name: VolumeType
parameters.description: The type of the file system. Only NAS file systems are supported.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) to which the E-HPC cluster belongs.

parameters.name: WinAdPar
parameters.description: The parameter that is used to connect to the Windows AD server.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The ID of the zone.
